content: **knitted shawl with angled garter stitch in drops big delight the piece is worked from side to side ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern db-115 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** length measured along the middle = approx 56 cm width measured along the top = approx 160 cm **materials** drops big delight from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300 g colour 12 jeans blue/teal **knitting gauge ** 14 stitches in width and 26 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 7 mm length 80 cm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
